nodes.text: The Observation Ship was a patrol vehicle employed by the cloners of Kamino during the creation, growth and training of the clone troopers.

The Observation Ships were shaped like airships, complete with a detachable Observation Gondola hanging underneath. The main observation deck was located midship and a repulsor-array was positioned directly underneath the main hull.

Observation Ships were used in the clone military education complex. They were large, mobile quality-control inspection laboratories that patrolled the Military Complex. Staffed by Kaminoan scientists, these vessels were on the look out not only for problems among clones, but also for ways to improve the cloning and training processes.
